item.title: Caroline add a quote by Phillip Pullman
item.description: "...think of Adam and Eve like an imaginary number, like the square root of minus one: you can never see any concrete proof that it exists, but if you include it in your equations, you can calculate all manner of things that couldn't be imagined without it." -- Phillip Pullman

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
Caroline add a quote by Gregory Maguire
item.description: "People who claim that they're evil are usually no worse than the rest of us... It's people who claim that they're good, or any way better than the rest of us, that you have to be wary of." -- Gregory Maguire

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "I wondered if that was how forgiveness budded; not with the fanfare of epiphany, but with pain gathering its things, packing up, and slipping away unannounced in the middle of the night." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "Life goes on, unmindful of beginning, endâ€¦crisis or catharsis, moving forward like a slow, dusty caravan of kochis (nomads)." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Joan Didion
item.description: "We tell ourselves stories in order to live." -- Joan Didion

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Joan Didion
item.description: "I write entirely to find out what I'm thinking, what I'm looking at, what I see and what it means. What I want and what I fear." -- Joan Didion

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Joan Didion
item.description: "We live entirely, especially if we are writers, by the imposition of a narrative line upon disparate images, by the "ideas" with which we have learned to freeze the shifting phantasmagoria which is our actual experience." -- Joan Didion

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Dermot Healy
item.description: "It's in a neighbor's house fiction begins." -- Dermot Healy

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Brady Udall
item.description: "It's a wonderful epiphany: with a lie I can change reality; with a lie I can change the world." -- Brady Udall

item.title: Caroline add a quote by John T. Price
item.description: "The belief that a man who works hard can erase all his sins runs deep in the folds of my family, and, I suspect, into the Midwestern landscape in which we were all raised." -- John T. Price
